introduction.title: <0>Create, discover, <1>be amazed.</1></0>
introduction.about: GIFBox is the new way to share and discover GIFs with your friends.

in_progress.paragraph: <0>We're hard at work on making GIFBox the best place to find awesome GIFs, but we're not quite there yet. In the meantime, we'll be posting updates and news on <1>Revolt</1>. So keep an eye out!</0>
